items.title: Learn React Navigation
items.desc: Install react native and dependencies,Install react navigation stack screen, bottom-tab, drawer,Learn authentication flows, make a signup navigation with authenthication flows, watch videos about react navigation at youtube

items.title: Jogging for 30 Minutes
items.shortDesc: Things to prepare: 1L of drinking water
items.desc: Things to prepare: 1L of drinking water, towel. Stretching, jumping and other mild exercises should be performed 5 to 10 minutes prior to a jog
